properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Ee Baba twaleta zawadi zetu
ee Baba
twaomba uzipokee). x2
(Japo ni kidogo sana Ee Baba
Twakusihi sana,
Baba uzipokee). x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mkate na Divai, ewe Baba -
twaomba uzipokee.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tunaleta fedha zetu, ewe Baba -
twaomba uzipokee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Mazao ya mashamba,
ewe Baba -
twaomba uyapokee.
